00120 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_read_conf_hash_parameter( config_file_t in_config,
00121                                                            cache_inode_parameter_t * pparam )
00122 {
00123   int     blk_index ;
00124   int     var_max ;
00125   int     var_index ;
00126   int     err ;
00127   char *  key_name ;
00128   char *  key_value ;
00129 
00130    /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00131   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00132     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00133 
00134   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00135   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_HASH ) ) < 0 )
00136     {
00137       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_HASH ) ; */
00138       return CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ;
00139     }
00140   
00141   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00142 
00143   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00144     {
00145       /* Get key's name */
00146       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00147                                       blk_index,
00148                                       var_index,
00149                                       &key_name,
00150                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00151         {
00152           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00153                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_HASH ) ;
00154           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00155         }
00156 
00157       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Index_Size" ) )
00158         {
00159           pparam->hparam.index_size = atoi( key_value ) ;
00160         }
00161       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Alphabet_Length" ) )
00162         {
00163           pparam->hparam.alphabet_length = atoi( key_value ) ;
00164         }
00165       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size" ) ) 
00166         {
00167           pparam->hparam.nb_node_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00168         }
00169       else
00170         {
00171            fprintf( stderr,
00172                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00173                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_HASH ) ;
00174           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00175         }
00176     }
00177   
00178 
00179   return CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00180 } /* cache_inode_read_conf_hash_parameter */
00181

00183  
00196 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_read_conf_client_parameter( config_file_t in_config,
00197                                                              cache_inode_client_parameter_t * pparam ) 
00198 {
00199   int     blk_index ;
00200   int     var_max ;
00201   int     var_index ;
00202   int     err ;
00203   char *  key_name ;
00204   char *  key_value ;
00205 
00206   int  DebugLevel   = -1;
00207   char * LogFile    = NULL;
00208   
00209   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00210   if( in_config == NULL || pparam == NULL )
00211     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00212 
00213   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00214   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_CLIENT ) ) < 0 )
00215     {
00216       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_CLIENT ) ; */
00217       return CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ;
00218     }
00219   
00220   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00221 
00222   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00223     {
00224       /* Get key's name */
00225       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00226                                       blk_index,
00227                                       var_index,
00228                                       &key_name,
00229                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00230         {
00231           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00232                   var_index, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_CLIENT ) ;
00233           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00234         }
00235   
00236       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00237         {
00238           pparam->lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00239         }
00240       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LRU_Nb_Call_Gc_invalid" ) )
00241         {
00242           pparam->lru_param.nb_call_gc_invalid = atoi( key_value ) ;
00243         } 
00244       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Entry_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00245         {
00246           pparam->nb_prealloc_entry = atoi( key_value ) ;
00247         }
00248       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "DirData_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00249         {
00250           pparam->nb_pre_dir_data = atoi( key_value ) ;
00251         }
00252       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "ParentData_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) )
00253         {
00254           pparam->nb_pre_parent = atoi( key_value ) ;
00255         }
00256       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "State_v4_Prealloc_PoolSize" ) ) 
00257         {
00258           pparam->nb_pre_state_v4 = atoi( key_value ) ;
00259         }
00260       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Attr_Expiration_Time" ) ) 
00261         {
00262           pparam->grace_period_attr = atoi( key_value ) ;
00263         }
00264       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Symlink_Expiration_Time" ) ) 
00265         {
00266           pparam->grace_period_link  = atoi( key_value ) ;
00267         }
00268       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Directory_Expiration_Time" ) ) 
00269         {
00270           pparam->grace_period_dirent = atoi( key_value ) ;
00271         }
00272       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Use_Getattr_Directory_Invalidation" ) )
00273         {
00274           pparam->getattr_dir_invalidation = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00275         }
00276       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Use_Test_Access" ) )
00277         {
00278           pparam->use_test_access = atoi( key_value ) ;
00279         }
00280       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Max_Fd" ) )
00281         {
00282           pparam->max_fd_per_thread = atoi( key_value ) ;
00283         }
00284       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "OpenFile_Retention" ) )
00285         {
00286           pparam->retention = atoi( key_value ) ;
00287         }
00288       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Use_OpenClose_cache" ) )
00289         {
00290           pparam->use_cache = StrToBoolean( key_value ) ;
00291         }
00292       else if ( !strcasecmp( key_name, "DebugLevel" ) )
00293       {
00294         DebugLevel = ReturnLevelAscii( key_value );
00295 
00296         if ( DebugLevel == -1 )
00297         {
00298           DisplayLog("cache_inode_read_conf: ERROR: Invalid debug level name: \"%s\".",
00299                 key_value );
00300           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00301         }
00302       }
00303       else if ( !strcasecmp( key_name, "LogFile" ) )
00304       {
00305 
00306         LogFile = key_value ;
00307 
00308       }        
00309       else
00310         {
00311           fprintf( stderr,
00312                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00313                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_CLIENT ) ;
00314           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00315         }
00316     }
00317     
00318     
00319   /* init logging */
00320   
00321   if ( LogFile )
00322   {
00323     desc_log_stream_t  log_stream;
00324     
00325     strcpy( log_stream.path , LogFile );
00326     
00327     /* Default : NIV_EVENT */
00328     
00329     if ( DebugLevel == -1 )
00330       AddLogStreamJd( &(pparam->log_outputs),
00331           V_FILE, log_stream, NIV_CRIT, SUP);
00332     else         
00333       AddLogStreamJd( &(pparam->log_outputs),
00334           V_FILE, log_stream, DebugLevel, SUP);
00335         
00336   }  
00337         
00338   return CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00339 } /* cache_inode_read_conf_client_parameter */

00355 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_read_conf_gc_policy( config_file_t in_config,
00356                                                       cache_inode_gc_policy_t * ppolicy ) 
00357 {
00358   int     blk_index ;
00359   int     var_max ;
00360   int     var_index ;
00361   int     err ;
00362   char *  key_name ;
00363   char *  key_value ;
00364   
00365   /* Is the config tree initialized ? */
00366   if( in_config == NULL || ppolicy == NULL  )
00367     return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00368   
00369   /* Get the config BLOCK */
00370   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( in_config, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_GCPOL ) ) < 0 )
00371     {
00372       /* fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read item \"%s\" from configuration file\n", CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_GCPOL ) ; */
00373       return CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ;
00374     }
00375   
00376   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( in_config, blk_index ) ;
00377   
00378   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00379     {
00380       /* Get key's name */
00381       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( in_config,
00382                                       blk_index,
00383                                       var_index,
00384                                       &key_name,
00385                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00386         {
00387           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00388             var_index, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_GCPOL );
00389           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00390         }
00391 
00392       if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "File_Lifetime" ) )
00393         {
00394           ppolicy->file_expiration_delay = atoi( key_value ) ;
00395         }
00396       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Directory_Lifetime" ) ) 
00397         {
00398           ppolicy->directory_expiration_delay = atoi( key_value ) ;
00399         }
00400       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "NbEntries_HighWater" ) ) 
00401         {
00402           ppolicy->hwmark_nb_entries = atoi( key_value ) ;
00403         }
00404       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "NbEntries_LowWater" ) ) 
00405         {
00406           ppolicy->lwmark_nb_entries = atoi( key_value ) ;
00407         }
00408       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Runtime_Interval" ) )
00409         {
00410           ppolicy->run_interval = atoi( key_value ) ;
00411         }
00412       else if( !strcasecmp( key_name, "Nb_Call_Before_GC" ) )
00413         {
00414           ppolicy->nb_call_before_gc = atoi( key_value ) ;
00415         }
00416       else
00417         {
00418           fprintf( stderr,
00419                    "Unknown or unsettable key: %s (item %s)\n",
00420                    key_name, CONF_LABEL_CACHE_INODE_GCPOL ) ;
00421           return CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00422         }
00423       
00424     }
00425   
00426 
00427   return CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00428 } /* cache_inode_read_conf_gc_policy */

00443 void cache_inode_print_conf_hash_parameter( FILE * output, cache_inode_parameter_t param )
00444 {
00445   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Hash: Index_Size              = %d\n", param.hparam.index_size ) ;
00446   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Hash: Alphabet_Length         = %d\n", param.hparam.alphabet_length ) ;
00447   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Hash: Prealloc_Node_Pool_Size = %d\n", param.hparam.nb_node_prealloc ) ;
00448 } /* cache_inode_print_conf_hash_parameter */

00463 void cache_inode_print_conf_client_parameter( FILE * output,  
00464                                               cache_inode_client_parameter_t param ) 
00465 {
00466   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: LRU_Prealloc_PoolSize        = %d\n",
00467            param.lru_param.nb_entry_prealloc ) ;
00468   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: LRU_Nb_Call_Gc_invalid       = %d\n",
00469            param.lru_param.nb_call_gc_invalid ) ;
00470   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Entry_Prealloc_PoolSize      = %d\n", param.nb_prealloc_entry ) ;
00471   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: DirData_Prealloc_PoolSize    = %d\n", param.nb_pre_dir_data ) ;
00472   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: ParentData_Prealloc_PoolSize = %d\n", param.nb_pre_parent ) ;
00473   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Attr_Expiration_Time         = %d\n", (int)param.grace_period_attr ) ;
00474   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Symlink_Expiration_Time      = %d\n", (int)param.grace_period_link ) ;
00475   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Directory_Expiration_Time    = %d\n", (int)param.grace_period_dirent ) ;  
00476   fprintf( output, "CacheInode Client: Use_Test_Access              = %d\n", param.use_test_access ) ;
00477 } /* cache_inode_print_conf_client_parameter */
00478 
00491 void cache_inode_print_conf_gc_policy( FILE * output,  cache_inode_gc_policy_t  gcpolicy )
00492 {
00493   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: File_Lifetime       = %d\n", gcpolicy.file_expiration_delay ) ;
00494   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Directory_Lifetime  = %d\n", gcpolicy.directory_expiration_delay ) ;
00495   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: NbEntries_HighWater = %d\n", gcpolicy.hwmark_nb_entries ) ;
00496   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: NbEntries_LowWater  = %d\n", gcpolicy.lwmark_nb_entries ) ;
00497   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Nb_Call_Before_GC   = %d\n", gcpolicy.nb_call_before_gc ) ;
00498   fprintf( output, "Garbagge Policy: Runtime_Interval    = %d\n", gcpolicy.run_interval ) ;
00499 } /* cache_inode_print_gc_pol */
